actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5303(a) of title 5, United States Code, to authorize higher minimum pay rates for certain additional Federal positions.

summary.text: Authorizes higher minimum pay rates for specified additional Federal positions when a group has unique character warranting higher minimum rates and the grade of the group precludes a higher classification. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5303(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5303(a) of title 5, United States Code, to authorize higher minimum pay rates for certain additional Federal positions.
